item.title: Join Pollex!
item.description: Let’s kickstart your career and boost your studies together!

Our activities We arrange movie nights, excursions and meetings with the corporate world. Lately we have visited Modulight in Tampere as well as GE Healthcare and Planmeca in Helsinki. We are also open to new ideas concerning free time activities and excursion destinations!

Board 2017 Chairman of the board: Sanna Kallio Secretary and vice chairman: Manu Kujala Treasurer: Eetu Siitama Studies: Timo Kankkunen Communications: Jere Laine Club room: Anna Malm God: Tiina Ristil√§ All emails are: firstname.lastname@student.tut.fi The entire board is reachable through pollex@tut.fi

Connecting people We share information about current and upcoming events, job opportunities and such on WhatsApp, Facebook and by email. We also have a LinkedIn page. Subscribe to our mailing list here!
Join us The membership fee is 2 euros. You can find our contact details below or join at any of our events.

Pollex? ü§î Pollex is the biomedical engineering club of Tampere University (of Technology). Our mission is to provide everyone interested in BME a place to meet, form connections and share job opportunities. A significant portion of our members are exchange students.

Events We do our best to provide fun, educating and inspiring pastime for our members. These include (but are not limited to) excursions, board game nights, coffee hours, kyykk√§, career events and pre-christmas parties. We are also open to new suggestions concerning the events!

Join us! We have a cozy clubroom in the basement of P√§√§rakennus next to Autek, INTO and Bioner. The membership fee is 2‚Ç¨ and so are our overall badges. Come meet us at any of our events or send an email to us at pollex[√§t]tut.fi!

Rules (in Finnish) I LUKU: Nimi, kotipaikka ja tarkoitus 1¬ß Yhdistyksen nimi on Pollex ja se on Tampereen teknillisen yliopiston ylioppilaskunnan (TTYY) alayhdistys. N√§iss√§ s√§√§nn√∂iss√§ siit√§ k√§ytet√§√§n nimityst√§ kerho. Kerhon kotipaikka on Tampereen kaupunki. Kerho on perustettu alkuvuodesta 1989 ja kerhon virallinen kieli on suomi. 2¬ß Kerhon tarkoituksena on yhdist√§√§ l√§√§ketieteellisen tekniikan opiskelijoita, her√§tt√§√§ ja yll√§pit√§√§ harrastusta ammatillisiin, sivistyksellisiin ja yhteiskunnallisiin kysymyksiin sek√§ ajaa j√§sentens√§ etuja korkeakoulussa ja alan ammatillisissa yhteis√∂iss√§.
